text: You see a big toad, it is standing on it's two hind legs and looks at you intently.
It is wearing a white shirt on it's upper body and has a strange necklace around it's neck.
* In a loud chirping voice, the toad calls out: *
A hah, heh, hello hello. My name is Ghyle of Nhula.
* The big toad lowers his head in a respectful bow and strethes out a long slimy hand in a friendly manner *

responses.text: * Grab the hand and give it a gentle shake * Greetings!

text: Oh heh, even though I certainly would wish to meet under different circumstances, heh he, STILL, it is a fine pleasure to make your acquaintance!
* The toad leans in with a big smile and stares at you, at an almost uncomfortably close range *
Please, if you'll allow me, let me burden you with the terrible tale of what unfortunate distasters befell me these past days, and how I ended up here.
All right! I'll seize hostilites if you agree to do the same.
